thread.title: Gregory
thread.title_full: ERIK'S Bike - Board - Ski reviewed by Gregory

author: Gregory
title: Gregory
text: I have never been so impressed with E comm customer as I was with Jeff at Erik's. I had a delivery issue with a new scooter for my son. I had keyed in an undeliverable address by mistake and my package was being returned to sender. With one phone call expecting that nothing could be done, Jeff stepped in and got to work on it right away. Jeff had great follow through and was able to get me a resolution to my problem. Above and beyond was the service I received. With so many retail and E comm options out there Jeff's response and follow through made me a life long customer.
